text: 3.6 Lom 5.2, Epe 2.21-22, Kol 1.23, 1 Ti 3.15, Hib 3.14, 6.11, 1 Pi 2.5 Klays pen ne God Ñɨne ak mɨdɨl, God takaw agak ak nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup. Ne God binɨb ne kɨli God kal ne tek mɨdebal okok kɨlop, mɨdupsek kod mɨdtep gup. Pen chɨn ma pɨlɨkɨl, God chɨnop gɨtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgab agɨl gos sek kod yonɨgun tek, chɨn abe God kal ne tek mɨdobun.
